question: Which country has announced to set up a Centre of Excellence in Information Technology (CEIT) at Al Azhar University, Egypt?
explanation: India has announced that, it would set up a Centre of Excellence in Information Technology (CEIT) at Al Azhar University, Egypt. India's Ambassador to Egypt, Sanjay Bhattacharyya, said that, the equipment and course material for CEIT have reached Egypt. Also, the premises are under construction.
